statements: UPDATE game_session_data SET score = 100 WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game_session_data SET feedback = 'Good job!' WHERE player_id = '876e5432-bcde-21f3-654a-123459876543';
UPDATE game_session_data SET score = 100, feedback = 'Great game!' WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game_session_data SET player_id = '78901234-5678-9012-3456-789012345678', duration = '2 hours' WHERE game_name = 'Chess' AND score < 50;
UPDATE game_sessions SET end_time = '2022-01-05 12:30:00' WHERE session_id = '46a657ab-72e2-4e63-897e-f254ed40a09f';
UPDATE feedback SET rating = 5, comment = 'Great experience!' WHERE session_id = 'a9611a3b-fd53-41a8-8063-12b92ea66d44';

UPDATE feedback SET rating = 5, comment = 'Great experience!' WHERE feedback_id = 'f9b25be8-c24f-4746-805a-077c901138fd';

UPDATE player_scores SET score = 100 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE game_sessions SET end_time = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE session_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE player_scores SET score = 100 WHERE player_id = 'xyz456' AND session_id = 'def789';
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_sessions SET duration_minutes = 60 WHERE player_id = 2 AND game_id = 3;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_sessions SET session_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00', duration_minutes = 60 WHERE player_id = 3 AND game_id = 5;
UPDATE players SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game_scores SET score = 100, level = 5 WHERE session_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe', registration_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
